titleInfo.title: Climate change
titleInfo.subTitle: inferences from paleoclimate and regional aspects

name.namePart: Milutin Milankovitch Anniversary Symposium (3rd : 2009 : Srpska akademija nauka i umetnosti)

physicalDescription.extent: xviii, 244 p. : ill. (chiefly col.), maps (chiefly col.) ; 27 cm.

mods.tableOfContents: Science, politics, and public perceptions of climate change / Richard C.J. Somerville -- Paleoclimate implications for human-made climate change / James E. Hansen and Makiko Sato -- Simulation of glacial cycles with an earth system model / Andrey Ganopolski and Reinhard Calov -- Modeling the interglacials of the last 1 million years / André Berger and Qiuzhen Yin -- Relating the astronomical timescale to the loess-paleosol sequences in Vojvodina, northern Serbia / Slobodan B. Marković ... [et al.] -- A spatial view on temperature change and variability during the last deglaciation : a model analysis / Didier M. Roche, Hans Renssen, and Didier Paillard -- Perspectives of parameter and state estimation in paleoclimatology / André Paul and Martin Losch -- A brief history of the astronomical theories of paleoclimates / André Berger -- Canon of eccentricity : how Milanković built a general mathematical theory of insolation / Aleksandar Petrović -- Exaggerated Milankovitch-like eccentricity cycles and extreme exoplanet climate variation / David S. Spiegel ... [et al.] -- Aquatic vegetation in river floodplains : climate change effects, river restoration and ecohydrology aspects / Georg A. Janauer -- Canadian regional climate model as a tool for assessing hydrological impacts of climate change at the watershed scale / Biljana Music ... [et al.] -- Analysis of the changes of the streamflows in Serbia due to climate changes / Dejan Dimkić and Jovan Despotović -- Considerations of domain size and large-scale driving for nested regional climate models : impact on internal variability and ability at developing small-scale details / René Laprise ... [et al.] -- Value added in regional climate modeling : should one aim to improve on the large scales as well? / Fedor Mesinger ... [et al.] -- Eta model simulations and AMSR images to study an event of polynya at Terra Nova Bay, Antarctica / Sandra Morelli and Flavio Parmiggiani -- Some indicators of the present and future climate of Serbia according to the SRES-A1B scenario / Aleksandra Kržič ... [et al.].
mods.note: André Berger, Fedor Mesinger, Djordje Šijački, editors.
Proceedings of the third international Milutin Milankovitch anniversay symposium organized by the Serbian Academy of Sciences and Arts in 2009. Cf. pref.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Converted from MARCXML to MODS version 3.5 using MARC21slim2MODS3-5.xsl (Revision 1.106 2014/12/19)
